title: Witness Patrol
description: Per-rig worker monitor patrol loop with progressive nudging.

title: Deacon Patrol
description: Mayor's daemon patrol loop for handling callbacks, health checks, and cleanup.

title: Refinery Patrol
description: Merge queue processor patrol loop with verification gates.

title: Integrate PDF generation into pipeline
description: Auto-generate PDF report after research completes. Add --no-pdf flag to skip. No more separate generate_pdf_report_v2.py step.

title: Add interactive menu mode
description: screen interactive - Shows menu-driven interface: 1) Run new research, 2) View status, 3) Generate report, 4) Open results, 5) Retry failed. No flags to remember.

title: Add quick access commands (open, pdf)
description: screen open <company> - Opens output folder in file manager. screen pdf <company> - Opens PDF in default viewer. Makes accessing results friction-free.

title: Reorganize outputs with date-based structure
description: Change from flat outputs/research_results/company_timestamp/ to outputs/YYYY-MM/company_name/. Add symlinks to latest report. Makes finding reports easier.
close_reason: Implemented date-based outputs structure with YYYY-MM folders and symlinks to latest

title: Create web dashboard for status monitoring
description: Replace terminal dashboard with local web dashboard. Real-time updates, click to open reports, filter by status. Run with screen dashboard.

title: [P2] Create comprehensive test suite for pipeline
description: Add pytest tests for: excel_reader, yaml_reader, perplexity_client, deepseek_client, pipeline orchestration, output_parser. Include mock API responses for testing without API calls.

title: [P2] Add README with clear usage instructions
description: Document: installation steps, required API keys, basic usage (screen run/status/list), output structure, troubleshooting common issues.

title: Create unified CLI wrapper with subcommands
description: Single 'screen' command with subcommands: screen run <company>, screen status, screen report <company>, screen list --completed|pending|failed. Replaces need to remember multiple scripts and flags.
